title: Regulations may be cited together as the Misuse of Drugs Regulations 2017 to
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as 

the Misuse of Drugs 

(Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the Regulations of 2019, the Misuse of 
Drugs (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 99 of 2020), the Misuse of 
Drugs (Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 210 of 2022), the Misuse of 
Drugs (Amendment) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 150 of 2023), the Misuse of 
Drugs (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 156 of 2023) and these 
Regulations may be cited together as the Misuse of Drugs Regulations 2017 to

title: Regulations may be cited together as the Misuse of Drugs Regulations 2017 to
Regulations may be cited together as the Misuse of Drugs Regulations 2017 to
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the Misuse of Drugs Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 
173 of 2017); 

“Regulations of 2019” means the Misuse of Drugs (Amendment) Regulations 
2019 (S.I. No. 282 of 2019).
text_norm: 2 regulations-- principal regulation mean misuse drug regulation 2017 (s.i no 173 2017) regulation 2019 mean misuse drug (amendment) regulation 2019 (s.i no 282 2019)

title: Regulations may be cited together as the Misuse of Drugs Regulations 2017 to
heading: 3. Schedule 2 (as amended by Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2019) to
text_raw:
3. Schedule 2 (as amended by Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2019) to 
the Principal Regulations is amended, in paragraph 6, by substituting 
“Lisdexamfetamine” for Lisdexamphetamine”.
text_norm: 3 schedule 2 (as amended regulation 4 regulation 2019) principal regulation amended paragraph 6 substituting lisdexamfetamine lisdexamphetamine

title: Regulations may be cited together as the Misuse of Drugs Regulations 2017 to
heading: 4. Part 5 of Schedule 8 to the Principal Regulations is amended by
text_raw:
4. Part 5 of Schedule 8 to the Principal Regulations is amended by 

inserting after the entry for “Methylphenidate” the following entry: 

“ 

Drug 

Route of administration 

Lisdexamfetamine 

Oral 

”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [71] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 February, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [71]

title: Regulations may be cited together as the Misuse of Drugs Regulations 2017 to
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the Misuse of Drugs Regulations 
2017 to insert Lisdexamfetamine into Schedule 8, Part 5, to allow registered 
nurses and registered midwives to prescribe Lisdexamfetamine for use in 
mental health or intellectual disability care. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Misuse of Drugs (Amendment) 
Regulations 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [71] 5
